我想問下teasury 同global market有咩唔同
我見都係interest rate fx果啲咁樣
求解答

做過IB treasury, 2年exp 人工Around$40K
主要trade FX SWAP/Forwards/FRA/IRS, 同Global market 唔同既係everything is for funding purpose only, not P/L nor market making
Treasury 主要manage unsecured funding & liquidity risk, 但某幾間bank 會同repo trading desk combine (secured funding)

做過IB treasury, 2年exp 人工Around$40K

Treasury 主要manage unsecured funding & liquidity risk, 但某幾間bank 會同repo trading desk combine (secured funding)

留意返IB 既corporate treasury 係middle office function, 同所有大公司都有treasury department 做FX TRADE/ risk mgm 一樣. IB front office 既treasury trading desks 多數叫Rates trading, falls under global market
